entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , L'Anse-au-Loup
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:23 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 1:30 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: -1.0°C
Wind: NNE 16 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to flurries and freezing rain this afternoon. Snowfall amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023
